Defines

#define UNIX

Detailed Description

Macro to know the operating system.

  • UNIX: Unix-like operating system.
  • LINUX: Linux operating system.
  • SUNOS: Sun operating system.
  • MACINTOSH: Macintosh or MacOS operating system.
  • WINDOWS: MS Windows operating system.
  • MSDOS: MS DOS operating system.
Author:
